info.title: CDR API
info.description: Use the Content Disarm and Reconstruction API to remove security risks from documents by tearing them down, removing unsafe content and rebuilding them.

post.summary: Complete Content Disarm and Reconstruction on an Input File, and output in same file format
post.description: Processes the input file via CDR to produce a secured output file.  Input content is parsed, disarmed, and then reconstructed into a new output file with the same file format as the input.

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Complete Content Disarm and Reconstruction on an Input File with PDF/A Output
post.description: Processes the input file via CDR to produce a secured PDF/A output file.  Input content is parsed, disarmed, and then reconstructed into a new PDF/A output file.

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from
